entry.title: Stealing Chrome cookies without a password
entry.summary:
Description

A new technique to steal someone's Chrome cookies once you've compromised their machine. Cooler because it doesn't need root üòé. This talk is about how the technique was found, how it works, and what you can do with it.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/stealing-chrome-cookies-without-a-password

Fri Aug 2 13:30:00 2019 at C3.

entry.title: Operation Luigi: How I hacked my friend without her noticing
entry.summary:
Description

My friend gave me permission to "hack all her stuff" and this is my story. It's about what I tried, what worked, my many flubs, and how easy it is to compromise Non Paranoid People TM.
